page.title: 10LIFE-STYLES LOCAL PUB
page.content: Mr Coppack,the manager,stocks up once a week and takes over Â£200 each day.His local bitter is brewed in Warrington and is the most popular drink sold in the pub.Nine different types of Whisky are sold, the most popular of which is Bell's.Nine different types of bottled beer are available and also a very strong cider called "Scrumpy Jack". The opening hours each day are from 11 a.m. to 3 p.m. and again from 5.30.p.m. to 10.30 p.m. - with an extra half hour on Fridays.Meals are available to customers for consumption with their drinks.This is a very popular public house, especially in the summer, when tourists necessitate an increase in the number of part time staff to six.At the present time it is a thriving concern according to the manager.
